summary: 8+ years of experience in implementing Identity and Access Management solutions across financial services, healthcare, and banking sectors
Expert in Forgerock (AM, IDM, IG, DS) and Ping Identity (PingFederate, PingDirectory, PingID, Ping Identity Cloud) implementation
